sentences.en: Eva testified to having seen Herndon with his gun on the stairs.
sentences.cn: 伊娃作证称看见过赫恩登持枪站在楼梯上。

sentences.en: Graham hit him across the face with the gun.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆用枪击打他的脸部。

sentences.en: Gun ownership by law-abiding people was not a problem.
sentences.cn: 让守法的人持有枪械并不会惹麻烦。

sentences.en: He produced a gun and he came into the house.
sentences.cn: 他掏出枪来，走进房子。

sentences.en: He trained his gun down and loosed a brief burst.
sentences.cn: 他用枪瞄准下面后，砰砰射出一串子弹。

sentences.en: I kept the gun aimed squarely at his eyes.
sentences.cn: 我一直将枪径直瞄准他的双眼。

sentences.en: I knew how to load and handle a gun.
sentences.cn: 我知道怎么上子弹，也知道枪怎么用。

sentences.en: I’ve never fired a gun in my life.
sentences.cn: 我这辈子从来没开过枪。

sentences.en: Jake was pointing a gun at the door.
sentences.cn: 杰克用枪对着门口。

sentences.en: She meticulously cleaned the gun and locked it away in its case.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地把枪擦拭干净，放进枪盒里锁好。

sentences.en: She reloaded the gun as quickly as she could.
sentences.cn: 她以最快的速度再次给枪装上子弹。

sentences.en: She took the gun and blazed away with calm and deadly accuracy.
sentences.cn: 她拿起枪，冷静地连续射击，弹无虚发。

sentences.en: The bore of the gun remained fixed on me.
sentences.cn: 枪口依然指着我。

sentences.en: The colonel rushed up to Earle, shaking his gun at him.
sentences.cn: 上校冲向厄尔，朝他挥着枪。

sentences.en: The gun was fired and Beaton was wounded a second time.
sentences.cn: 枪响了，比顿再次受伤。

sentences.en: The man's gun flicked up from beside his thigh.
sentences.cn: 那个男人迅速从大腿一侧抽出枪来。

sentences.en: The stationmaster pounced and wrestled the gun from him.
sentences.cn: 站长猛扑过去，奋力夺下他手中的枪。

sentences.cn: 争夺为众人觊觎的主席之位的大佬们。

sentences.en: Two policemen were killed in a gun battle .
sentences.cn: 两名警察在一次枪战中丧生。

sentences.cn: 在那个问题上我们坚持了自己的立场。
